dashboard.realTimeMonitoring: Real-time monitoring and analytics of global disease outbreaks
dashboard.casesReportedOverTime: Cases reported over time by disease type
dashboard.noDataAvailable: No data available for the selected time range
dashboard.rankedByReports: Ranked by number of outbreak reports
dashboard.cityExtractionDescription: Shows cities extracted from news articles and stored in outbreak signals
dashboard.noCitiesFound: No cities found in outbreak signals yet.
dashboard.citiesWillAppear: Cities will appear here once news articles are processed with city extraction enabled.
dashboard.deepseekApiKeyError: Please ensure DEEPSEEK_API_KEY is configured in your Supabase edge function.
dashboard.numberOfOutbreakReportsByDiseaseType: Number of outbreak reports by disease type
dashboard.diseaseReportingFrequencyOverTime: Disease reporting frequency over time (similar to Google Trends)
dashboard.valuesNormalizedNote: Values are normalized to 0-100 scale where the peak represents 100. This allows easy comparison of trends regardless of absolute numbers.
dashboard.chronologicalTrackingOfOutbreakEvents: Chronological tracking of outbreak events and response actions
dashboard.aiGeneratedPredictionsDescription: AI-generated predictions updated automatically when new outbreak data is received
dashboard.predictionsGenerationTime: This may take 15-20 seconds. Predictions are usually pre-generated and load instantly.
dashboard.noPredictionsAvailable: No predictions available. This may be due to insufficient outbreak data.
dashboard.aboutAiPredictionsDescription: Our AI models powered by DeepSeek automatically analyze recent outbreak signals, disease patterns, and geographic data to generate predictions about case forecasts, geographic spread, and risk assessments. Predictions are automatically regenerated when new outbreak data is collected (every 6 hours) and stored for instant access. This enables proactive response and preparedness planning based on the latest data from the past 30 days.
dashboard.visualBreakdownOfDiseases: Visual breakdown of diseases by transmission method and outbreak type
dashboard.detailedInformationAboutEachCategory: Detailed information about each outbreak category ({{count}} total)
dashboard.noDiseaseDataAvailableForCategories: No disease data available for categories yet.
dashboard.viewAndExportAllOutbreakData: View and export all outbreak data as CSV
dashboard.noOutbreakDataFound: No outbreak data found for the selected time range
dashboard.chooseWhichDataToExport: Choose which data you want to export as CSV:
dashboard.downloadRecords: Download {{count}} records shown on page {{page}} of {{total}}
dashboard.noFiltersApplied: No filters applied - same as all data
dashboard.allRecordsFromTimeRange: All {{count}} records from selected time range
dashboard.compareGoogleTrendsSearchInterest: Compare Google Trends search interest for diseases (select up to 5)
dashboard.selectAtLeastOneDisease: Select at least one disease to view trends
dashboard.noDataAvailableForTimeRange: No data available for this time range

footer.description: OutbreakNow is a platform developed by EldoNova+ Technologies in partnership with the Global Health and Quality Alliance (GHQA) to advance real-time outbreak monitoring, enhance global public health intelligence, and support rapid response efforts worldwide.
footer.contactDescription: Have questions, suggestions, or partnership inquiries?
footer.subscribeSuccessDesc: You'll receive outbreak alerts and updates.
footer.disclaimerText: OutbreakNow provides outbreak and public health data for informational purposes only. While every effort is made to ensure accuracy, the platform is not a substitute for professional medical advice or guidance from public health authorities.
footer.dataSourcesText: Data is compiled from multiple verified sources, including WHO, CDC, ECDC, national ministries of health, and the OutbreakNow Global Outbreak Monitoring System. Data feeds are updated in real-time or near real-time depending on source availability.
footer.privacyLegalText: OutbreakNow is committed to protecting user privacy and adhering to applicable data protection regulations. All personal information is handled in accordance with our privacy policy. By using the platform, you agree to our terms of service and legal notices.
footer.termsOfUseText: By accessing or using OutbreakNow, you agree to comply with these Terms of Use. The platform is intended for informational and educational purposes only and must not be relied upon as the sole source for medical or public health decision-making. Data and content are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind, either expressed or implied. OutbreakNow and its partners shall not be held liable for any loss, injury, or damage arising from the use of this platform. Users are responsible for verifying information through official public health channels before taking action. OutbreakNow reserves the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the platform at any time without prior notice.

about.title: About Us ‚Äì OutbreakNow
about.description: OutbreakNow is a real-time outbreak intelligence platform designed to detect, track, and visualize emerging public health threats as they unfold. Built at the intersection of epidemiology, clinical medicine, informatics, and quality improvement, OutbreakNow empowers governments, health systems, researchers, and communities with timely, actionable insights‚Äîhelping to prevent outbreaks from becoming epidemics.
about.missionSubtitle: Enable rapid detection. Enhance preparedness. Strengthen global health resilience.
about.missionBody: OutbreakNow integrates modern analytics, geospatial visualization, crowdsourced signals, and laboratory/clinical data streams to provide a unified view of public health events. By combining human expertise with intelligent technology, we aim to bridge critical gaps in disease surveillance and response.
about.visionBody: We envision a world where no outbreak goes unnoticed, where frontline health workers and public health leaders have the tools they need to act swiftly, and where data drives coordinated, life-saving action.
about.visionHighlight: OutbreakNow stands at the frontier of digital epidemiology‚Äîcreating a smarter, faster, and more connected approach to global health security.
about.founderTagline: Medical doctor ‚Ä¢ Epidemiologist ‚Ä¢ Public Health Informatics Specialist
about.founderP1: OutbreakNow was founded by Dr. Aim√© Lufulwabo, a physician informatician and public health specialist whose career spans clinical medicine, epidemiology, health technology, and innovation.
about.founderP2: Dr. Lufulwabo completed his medical education at the University of Lubumbashi in the Democratic Republic of Congo, where his early training in microbiology in medical school sparked his passion for infectious diseases and disease surveillance.
about.founderP3: He went on to earn a Masters of Public Health from Yale University, specializing in epidemiology and public health informatics, and later pursued postgraduate medical education at Harvard University, focusing on: Patient Safety, Quality Improvement, Clinical Informatics, and Healthcare Leadership.
about.founderP4: He is the founder and Chairman of the Global Health and Quality Alliance (GHQA) and the American Board of Digital Medicine.
about.founderP5: OutbreakNow is the culmination of his multidisciplinary expertise‚Äîuniting the principles of microbiology, epidemiology, informatics, and quality improvement to create a modern platform capable of transforming how the world detects and responds to outbreaks.
about.founderP6: Dr. Lufulwabo's work reflects his lifelong commitment to strengthening health systems, improving preparedness, and ensuring that communities‚Äîespecially those most vulnerable‚Äîare protected by timely, accurate, and actionable public health intelligence.
about.commitmentTransparency: Open and honest communication in public health data
about.commitmentEquity: Ensuring underserved regions have access to real-time tools
about.commitmentInnovation: Using the best of technology and science
about.commitmentCollaboration: Working with universities, governments, and global partners
about.movementLine1: OutbreakNow is more than a platform‚Äî
about.movementLine2: It is a movement toward a safer, healthier world.

partner.title: Join Us in Shaping the Future of Outbreak Response
partner.body: We're actively seeking partners, collaborators, and sponsors to expand OutbreakNow's global coverage, enhance predictive models, and make life-saving information more accessible. Whether you're a public health agency, research institution, technology provider, or NGO, your contribution can help us protect millions.

donate.title: Support Our Mission
donate.intro: Your generous donations help us expand global health surveillance, improve predictive models, and make life-saving information accessible to communities worldwide. Every contribution makes a difference in protecting public health.
donate.tier25: Support data collection for one region
donate.where1: Expanding global data coverage to underserved regions
donate.where2: Enhancing AI prediction accuracy and early warning systems
donate.where3: Maintaining real-time infrastructure and data processing
donate.where4: Providing free access to public health organizations
donate.where5: Research and development of new monitoring technologies

hero.title: Advertise with OutbreakNow
hero.body: Reach thousands of healthcare professionals, policymakers, researchers, and global health enthusiasts. Advertise your products, services, or initiatives on our platform and make a meaningful impact in global health surveillance.

why.title: Why Advertise with OutbreakNow?
why.targetedBody: Connect with 50,000+ active users including public health officials, epidemiologists, healthcare providers, and decision-makers.
why.globalBody: Your message reaches professionals across 200+ countries and territories worldwide.
why.engagementBody: Our platform sees daily engagement from users actively seeking outbreak intelligence and health solutions.
why.trustedBody: Associate your brand with a credible source of real-time outbreak intelligence trusted globally.

opportunities.title: Advertising Opportunities
opportunities.mapBody: Premium placement in the sponsored section on our interactive outbreak map ‚Äì the most visited page on OutbreakNow.
opportunities.homepageBody: High-visibility banner placement on our homepage, reaching visitors as they first arrive on our platform.
opportunities.newsletterBody: Reach our engaged subscriber base through dedicated newsletter features and mentions in our weekly outbreak intelligence updates.

plans.title: Advertising Plans
plans.notice: All plans include detailed analytics and dedicated support. You only pay after your application is approved.

form.title: Start Advertising Today
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below. Our team will review your application and contact you within 24-48 hours. You only pay after approval!
form.cardDescription: Tell us about your organization and advertising goals
form.loginRequiredBody: You must be logged in to submit an advertising application. This helps us track your submissions and send you real-time updates.
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell us about your products/services and what you hope to achieve through advertising on OutbreakNow...
form.adContentBody: You can provide ad content now or after approval. Our team can help create your ad if needed.
form.adImageHelp: Upload your ad image (JPG, PNG, or WebP, Max 5MB). This will be displayed on the map. If not provided, a default image will be used.
form.documentHelp: Accepted formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, PNG (Max 10MB)
form.submitDisclaimer: By submitting, you agree to our terms of service. You will only be charged after your application is approved.

errors.fileTooLargeDesc: Please select a file smaller than 10MB.

note.title: Note
note.documentSkipped: Document upload skipped - storage not configured or access denied. Your application will still be submitted.
note.imageStorageSkipped: Image upload skipped - storage not configured. Your application will still be submitted.
note.imageAccessSkipped: Image upload skipped - access denied. Your application will still be submitted.

success.title: Application Submitted! üéâ
success.desc: You'll receive a notification when your application is reviewed. Check the notification bell for updates!
success.longDesc: Thank you for your interest in advertising with OutbreakNow. We've received your application and will review it within 24-48 hours. You'll receive a real-time notification in the app once our review is complete.
success.step1Body: Our team will review your submission within 24-48 hours. Please check your email regularly.
success.step2Body: If approved, you'll receive a notification with a payment link. Check the notification bell in the header.
success.step3Body: Click the payment link in your email and complete the secure payment process to activate your advertisement.
success.step4Body: Once payment is confirmed, your advertisement will be activated and displayed on OutbreakNow!
success.importantNote: Important: You'll receive real-time notifications in the app. Check the notification bell in the header for updates. You can also track your submission in your dashboard.
